tool_description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to products, price, sales and reviews data from amazon in JSON format
name: Amazon Data Scraper _v2
title: Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Search results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-data-scraper126.p.rapidapi.com/search/mac"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-data-scraper126.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-data-scraper126.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-data-scraper126.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get product's reviews
